name: Smoke Attack
storyline: In this smoking-risk awarenesss game from the swiss federal office of public health, you are navigating the character "Oxy" through offices. You can fight the aggressive smoking balls and the cigarettes by shooting them with your oxygen gun. There are a lot of extra ammunitions, secret weapons and keys hidden in the office. Find and use them! Your goal is to reach the next level and fight even more smoke.
summary: Smoke Attack is a top-down shooter game made for the Swiss government as part of an anti-smoking campaign. The player fights against the aggressive smoking balls with cigarettes by shooting them with an oxygen gun. The goal is to reach the next level and fight even more smoke. On each level players can find extra ammunition, secret weapons and hidden keys. The gameplay is non-violent; after being shot smoking balls are turned into oxygen.
